description: Compiler/lint/format gate suite execution with categorized outputs for provider expansion scope

cargo_check.notes: Clean compilation for lib, bin, tests, and benches

cargo_clippy.notes: Clean after fixing one pre-existing visibility issue (see remediation below)

remediation_applied.description: build_conversation_content() had pub(super) visibility after modularization extraction (bd-21mwg), but benches/tui_perf.rs needs external access
remediation_applied.root_cause: interactive.rs modularization moved method to view.rs submodule with restrictive visibility

lint.description: No clippy warnings or errors with -D warnings

infra.description: tmpfs (/dev/shm) at 100% capacity from 5 concurrent agent build dirs; mitigated by switching to /tmp filesystem target

entries.root_cause: 5 concurrent agents (claude_opus, codexgpt5, opus_agent, opus_main, topazfalcon) all using /dev/shm for build dirs
entries.recommendation: Consider periodic cleanup of stale agent build dirs or increasing tmpfs size

summary.verdict: Provider expansion scope passes all compiler/lint/format gates. Single pre-existing visibility issue from concurrent modularization (bd-21mwg) remediated inline.
